name: Modern Apartment
description: A beautiful modern apartment in the heart of the city center. This stunning property features floor-to-ceiling windows that flood the space with natural light, creating an airy and inviting atmosphere. The contemporary design seamlessly blends comfort with sophistication, making it perfect for both relaxation and entertaining. The property boasts high-end finishes, smart home technology, and an ergonomic layout that maximizes space efficiency.
details:
2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, open kitchen, and balcony. Features include:
- Smart home automation
- Floor-to-ceiling windows
- Hardwood flooring
- Modern appliances
- Underground parking
- 24/7 security

name: Luxury Beach Villa
description: Stunning oceanfront villa with panoramic sea views. This luxurious property offers the perfect blend of indoor and outdoor living, featuring an infinity pool that seems to merge with the horizon. The villa's open-plan design captures the essence of coastal living with large sliding doors that create a seamless flow between spaces.
details:
4 bedrooms, 3.5 bathrooms, infinity pool, private beach access. Features include:
- Private beach access
- Infinity pool
- Gourmet kitchen
- Home theater
- Double garage
- Smart security system

name: Cozy Mountain Cabin
description: Charming log cabin nestled in the mountains offering a perfect retreat from city life. This rustic yet comfortable property features exposed wooden beams, a stone fireplace, and large windows that showcase the breathtaking mountain views. The wraparound deck provides the perfect spot for outdoor entertainment.
details:
3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, loft space. Features include:
- Stone fireplace
- Wraparound deck
- Hot tub
- Fully furnished
- Solar panels
- Mountain views

name: Urban Loft
description: Industrial-style loft in a converted warehouse featuring exposed brick walls and soaring ceilings. This unique space combines historic character with modern amenities, creating an impressive urban dwelling that's perfect for the creative professional.
details:
1 bedroom, 1.5 bathrooms, open concept. Features include:
- 14-foot ceilings
- Original brick walls
- Industrial windows
- Chef's kitchen
- Built-in storage
- Rooftop access

name: Suburban Family Home
description: Spacious family home in a quiet suburban neighborhood with excellent schools nearby. This well-maintained property offers plenty of living space, a landscaped garden, and modern updates throughout, making it perfect for growing families.
details:
4 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, finished basement. Features include:
- Modern kitchen
- Family room
- Home office
- Attached garage
- Fenced backyard
- Central air

name: Eco-Friendly Tiny House
description: Innovative tiny house designed with sustainability in mind. This compact home maximizes every square foot while minimizing environmental impact. Perfect for those seeking a simpler, more sustainable lifestyle without compromising on comfort.
details:
Studio layout, full bathroom. Features include:
- Solar power system
- Rainwater collection
- Composting toilet
- Murphy bed
- Built-in storage
- Off-grid capability
